project-cards.title: AI: Probabiblistic Agents
project-cards.description: Build three different models for agent that suggest the trading action (buy/hold/sell).

project-cards.title: Machine Learning: Car-accident Prediction
project-cards.description: Build three different models to predict the likelihood of personal injury based on accident details.

project-cards.title: NFA-to-DFA Converter
project-cards.description: Build a Converter so that it takes as input a representation of an NFA over an alphabet and outputs a representation of a DFA over this alphabet that recognizes the same language.

project-cards.title: Huffman Coding
project-cards.description: Implement two programs: compress file and uncompress file.

project-cards.title: Graphs
project-cards.description: Implement a class to represent graphs. Users can find an unweighted shortest path, a weighted shortest path, connected components and the smallest connecting threshold.
